title: Premiere of Box-Office Shattering 'Deadpool 2' in Colombo
abstract: Deadpool 2 hits local theaters on May 20th.
author: Vishvi
content:
The trendiest radio station TNL Radio premiered the Box-Office shattering Marvel Comics Superhero movie “Deadpool 2”, recently at the Scope Cinemas in conjunction with the world premiere.
TNL Radio collaborated with Skyline Entertainment to present the highly anticipated, critically acclaimed superhero movie to the public.
Some of the prominent local actors, such as Sanath Gunathilake, Arjun Kamalnath, and veteran film directors, Udayakantha Warnasuriya, Asoka Handagama and Jayantha Chandrasiri were also invited to this red carpet event.
The sequel itself is far more entertaining than the first one and Ryan Reynolds, the star of the movie unleashes a bunch of meta-references to other movies, comics and so many other things that we can relate to.
Deadpool 2 will be available in theaters from this Thursday (May 17th, 2018). So hurry up and reserve your tickets through
.
